Pre-Game Insights: Ghana is a four-time AFCON winner in the years 1963, 1965, 1978, and 1982. Many are tipping Ghana to be the victor of today’s match against Namibia who has not been able to win the AFCON championship ever.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The public is hereby notified by organisers that the Centre Line and Popular stands are free of charge.
Others: Ghana has scheduled an international friendly match against Namibia at the Baba Yara Sports stadium on Monday, January 8, 2024. This game has been organized as part of their preparation for the 34th edition of the TotalEnergies Africa Cup of Nations Cote D’Ivoire 2023.
